mapper.select: select m.userId, m.userName, m.userPhoneNumber,m.userEmail, m.userCompany, s.syllabusName, ct.courseId, ct.courseTake_State, to_char(courseTake_ApplyDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as applyDate, p.partnerLicenseNum ,p.partnerName, to_char(c.coursestart, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as courseStart, to_char(c.courseend,'yyyy-mm-dd') as courseEnd, m.birth, s.syllabustotaltime from course_Take ct join kt_user m on (ct.userID = m.userId) join course c on (c.courseid=ct.courseid) join syllabus s on (s.syllabusid = c.syllabusid) join partner p on (p.partnerLicenseNum = m.userCompany) order by courseTake_ApplyDate desc
mapper.delete: delete from course_Take where userID = #{userID} and courseID=#{courseID}

mapper.insert: insert into course_take (userid, courseid, coursetake_state,coursetake_applydate) values (#{userID}, #{courseID}, '승인대기', to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS'),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.update: update course_take set coursetake_state = '수강중' where (courseid in (select courseid from course where coursestart <= sysdate)) and coursetake_state='승인'
